Keywords: Cosmic , Eternal , Minions of Thanos , Ruler
Real Name: Thanos
Special Powers
TARGETING: Adjacent
AN INFINITY MJOLNIR OF MY OWN CREATION: When Thanos hits, roll a d6.
1: MIND - After resolutions Thanos may use Mind Control as FREE, but only to target a hit character regardless of range or line of fire.
2: POWER - Increase the damage dealt by +1 to each hit target.
3: REALITY - After resolutions, you may generate a hindering, blocking or water terrain marker in a square adjacent to a hit character.
4: SOUL - After resolutions, heal Thanos 2 clicks.
5: SPACE - After resolutions, you may place a hit character in a square within 5 squares of their current square.
6: TIME - Until the end of your next turn, Thanos can use Probability Control and opposing characters can't use Probability Control.
DARKNESS AND NOTHING MORE: STOP. Impervious, Regeneration. Thanos can reduce penetrating damage.

January 25, 2022
FreePineapple
When the sculpt for this figure was previewed, I was super excited to see the dial. Now that we have it, I can't help but feel disappointed. If you didn't know Thanos had Mjolnir from his sculpt, there really isn't anything on this dial that would tell you he does. The triple target is about it. While the trait is cool, you could use that on any iteration of Thanos with the gems. Maybe I'm just ranting, but I wanted more Thor-like abilities to go with this Thanos.
January 18, 2022
Goop
Hes mostly a fun piece obviously since you never know what you are going to roll. If you get soul gem on top click or the reality gem you aren't gaining a whole lot. Still for his stats alone he's pretty solid, a 5 damage pen blast at the top is nothing to dismiss. Opens with 4 clicks of 12atk and never falls below 11atk or 18def. A great stop click too.
